participant_1.name: Sophia
participant_1.personality: Creative and nurturing, enjoys helping others express themselves through art and staying active.
participant_1.background: I usually spend my free time practicing music or reading about clothing trends. I am an art teacher. I would love to have lunch with my sponsor, who has helped me so much on my journey of recovery. I enjoy spending time with my nieces and nephews, helping them get fit and have fun at the same time. I have a cat named Oscar who is my best friend.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Diligent and introspective, finds solace in writing and enjoys experimenting with healthy living.
participant_2.background: I am a hard worker and I am passionate about my writing. I think beets are the best vegetable. I make a batch of my favorite soap and smell it while I relax. I am on a keto diet. I'm not sure how I feel about the weather today.

content.text: Good afternoon! I am an art teacher.
Hi there! I am a writer. What do you like to teach?
I teach a lot about design and how to create beautiful things.
I love design! I like to write about design.
I like beets. They are so sweet.
I like beets too! Do you make your own soap?
I do! I make it with coconut oil and beetroot powder.
That sounds amazing! I love the smell of soap.
I am on a keto diet. Do you know what it is?
I have heard of it, but I don't know much about it.
It's a low carb diet. I've been on it for a few weeks and I'm really enjoying it.
I'm glad to hear you're enjoying it. I might have to look into it.
